alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central St. Johns, northeastern Clay and Duval Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 130 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cisco Gardens to near Mandarin to 6 miles south of World Golf Village. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Saint Augustine, Orange Park, Unf, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Arlington, Ponte Vedra Beach, Jacksonville Beach and Atlantic Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
